name: Excel Formula Generator
description: Generates complex Excel formulas and provides spreadsheet automation solutions with intelligent data processing

skills.name: generateFormula
skills.description: Creates complex Excel formulas based on natural language descriptions and data requirements
examples: Create a VLOOKUP formula for product pricing
Generate conditional formatting formula for sales targets
Build a pivot table summary formula

skills.name: optimizeSpreadsheet
skills.description: Analyzes Excel files and suggests performance optimizations and formula improvements
examples: Suggest formula improvements for better performance
